Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= female of אַיָּל (אַיָּל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= action by which animals, humans, or deities produce a full, deep, prolonged sound as made by a lion
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= during the daytime
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= state in which someone refrains from speaking
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ as if sitting on an actual throne
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= indirect male progenitor
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= a general term for worms of all kinds; ≈ associated with uncleanness, decay, and insignificance
= an individual, nation, or land that is affected by efforts from others to arouse an emotion of shame in them ◄ by words or actions
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
only used in poetry; = action by which humans or deities express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= action by which humans show there confidence in a deity by putting difficult matters in that deity's hands, ◄ like a heavy stone is rolled on to someone else who is more able to carry it
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which someone removes part of a previously integrated unit
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

Node.gloss: to give (someone) confidence|to make (someone) feel secure
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity causes humans to live with confidence and without fear
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= part of the lower body of women and mammals where offspring are conceived and in which they grow until their birth; ≈ sometimes extended to refer to a woman, the time of birth, the place where something is produced, and the innermost part of an area
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= powerful person ◄ compared with a bull; ≈ associated with power, authority, and/or aggression
= region; ◄ north east of the River Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ► at one time ruled by king Og (עֹוג) later assigned to half of the tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness
= action by which animals, humans, or deities produce a full, deep, prolonged sound as made by a lion; ≈ associated with aggression, but also with suffering
= causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance

Node.gloss: to be detached|to be disjointed|to be spread out|to be split
Node.definition: = process by which an object is split up into smaller units
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= solid, yellowish substance ◄ secreted by bees; ► used in different ways; ≈ melts before fire and so becomes a metaphor for disappearance, destruction, and death
literally: (one's) heart melts; hence: = state in which humans lose all courage

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

Node.gloss: to dry up > to become weak
Node.definition: = process by which someone loses vital energy ◄ due to anxiety or some trouble

= piece of baked clay; often with sharp, jagged edges; ◄ part of a broken earthenware vessel; ► can be used for activities like scooping water, carrying hot coals, scraping oneself, and wounding oneself in order to express one's sorrow; ≈ symbol of dryness
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= state in which an object is positioned around or against another object in such a way that the two cannot be separated easily
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= process by which humans or animals stop living
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object

= relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a pig (חֲזִיר) associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= action with which one determines or estimates the number of a collection of persons or objects

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= generic designation for any article of clothing
literally: to let lots fall; hence: = causative action by which humans throw lots in order to select individuals or groups from among a large group
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= state of being strong, powerful, and able to save others
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= action by which someone performs an event quickly
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a pig (חֲזִיר) associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes
literally: unique one; = the life principle that animates both humans and animals and functions as the center of their personality
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a wild, untamable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinoceros; ≈ symbol of strength, wildness, and power
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect
= state in which humans experience a strong fear of other humans, deities, or animals
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
= state in which humans or deities regard an object or person as utterly detestable, as associating with it would make them unclean
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= state in which humans experience fear
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

Node.gloss: to be, become confident|to be, become happy
Node.definition: = to live with hope, confidence, and happiness
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= an adverb that specifies unending time

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: ends of the earth > all people on earth
Node.definition: literally: ends of the earth; hence: = all people on earth, including those living in its remotest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= process by which humans and plants are vigorous and strong, ◄ as if full of fat and oil

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to keep oneself alive|to save one's own life
Node.definition: = to cause oneself to remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= all of the people born and living at about the same time

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
